General.Name: Foncière Euris SA
General.Description: Foncière Euris SA distributes food and specialized products in France and internationally. The company also owns real estate assets, including shopping centers; and manages commercial real estate properties and private equity portfolio. The company was incorporated in 1970 and is based in Paris, France. Foncière Euris SA operates as a subsidiary of Finatis Société Anonyme.
General.Address: 83, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, Paris, France, 75008
